citation: Proclamation under the Radiation Protection Act 2005 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Radiation Protection Act 2005

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Radiation Protection Act 2005 fix 1 June 2006 as the day on which that Act commences.

15 May 2006

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

LARA GIDDINGS

Minister for Health and Human Services

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 24 May 2006

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Health and Human Services.
